Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “Normally I just roll my eyes and walk away because I’m fighting a losing battle and I’m fully aware of that,”
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: a paralegal for the Republican county attorney

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “You feel skeevy and dirty when you do it. But you do it anyway and you change it back as soon as you can, because you don’t want to start getting the Republican mailings,”
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: a paralegal for the Republican county attorney

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “How far are they going to limit one’s ability to vote? If it really comes down to purifying the party, on a voting level all the way up to the elected officials, pretty soon there isn’t going to be anyone left who’s pure enough to be in the party,”
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: former middle school English teacher and Democratic state representative
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: a former middle school English teacher and Democratic state representative

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “The best way to participate in meaningful change is to try to sway the dominant party,”
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: a truck driver who supports many left-leaning goals

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: “Most people don’t want to dive into those type of discussions,”
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: high school boys basketball team coach
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: the high school boys basketball team coach
